Package mypackage

Class EntryConverter

java.lang.Object
mypackage.EntryConverter
public class EntryConverter
extends java.lang.Object
A class used for converting byte arrays to lists of WordEntry objects and the opposite

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private static int BUFFER_SIZE
    Member variable for the BUFFER_SIZE value It is set according to the given MAX_WORD_SIZE variable

    Member variable for the MAX_WORD_SIZE value It follows the Indexer's member variable by using a static method provided.
    private static int PAGE_SIZE
    Member variable for the PAGE_SIZE value It follows the Indexer's member variable by using a static method provided.

    Method for adjusting the length of string to MAX_WORD_SIZE by adding spaces if neededs
    byte[] listToBytes​(java.util.List<WordEntry> entries)
    Method for creating a list of WordEntry objects to an array of bytes The list usually contains as much items as a page can fit

  • Method Details

    • listToBytes

      public byte[] listToBytes​(java.util.List<WordEntry> entries)
      Method for creating a list of WordEntry objects to an array of bytes The list usually contains as much items as a page can fit
      Parameters:
      entries - : The list of WordEntry objects to be converted
      Returns:
      byte[] : The byte array corresponding to the entries

    • bytesToList

      public java.util.List<WordEntry> bytesToList​(byte[] data)
      Method that converts a byte array read from a file page to a list of WordEntry items
      Parameters:
      data - The page byte array that was read from the FilePageAccess.read()
      Returns:
      List The list of word entries described from the bytes provided

    • fixedLengthString

      public java.lang.String fixedLengthString​(java.lang.String string)
      Method for adjusting the length of string to MAX_WORD_SIZE by adding spaces if neededs
      Parameters:
      string - : The word to be adjusted
      Returns:
      String : The adjusted String
